children.onRowSelected: {{fetch_staff_details.run(() => showModal('staff_details_modal'), () => showAlert('data could not be retrieved.','error'))}}
children.label: Data

children.text: Add a staff member to gutheria.

children.onClick: {{add_staff_details.run(() => closeModal('add_staff_modal'), () => showAlert('could not add new staff member!!Please try again later.','error'))}}

children.onClose: {{fetch_staff.run(() => resetWidget("add_staff_modal",true), () => showAlert('could not add new staff to gutheria.'))}}
